EmailTemplate.description: A customer-facing email that is sent when a SIM card is shipped
EmailTemplate.name: XOM: SIM Shipped
EmailTemplate.subject: Your SIM Is on Its Way, {!Contact.FirstName} ({!Order.OrderNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your SIM card is on its way
Still there, {!Contact.FirstName}?
Our delivery partner has just confirmed that your SIM card is on its way.
Once you receive the SIM card, plug it into your phone and activate it using our mobile app.
Not sure how to do that? Check this article for more details
Still have questions? Contact our customer care team
Lunch&Learn, Rembrandtplein 19, 1017 CT Amsterdam
